title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the InclusivityAnalyzer tool, including target users, use cases, desired features, data sources, integration points, security and privacy considerations, and performance and scalability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects.
dependencies: Conduct Market Research and Competitor Analysis

title: Define Data Model and Storage
description: Design the data model and storage solution for company communications, decisions, and analysis results.

title: Develop Analysis Algorithms
description: Implement algorithms and machine learning models to analyze company communications and decisions for inclusivity and diversity.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the InclusivityAnalyzer tool, including data input, analysis configuration, and result visualization.

title: Implement Data Integration
description: Develop mechanisms to integrate company communications and decisions from various sources into the InclusivityAnalyzer tool.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and protect sensitive company information.

title: Create Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite to validate the functionality and performance of the InclusivityAnalyzer tool.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for the InclusivityAnalyzer tool.
